text: Jose Benito Saura Mendez (born December 4, 1978 in Murcia) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind and a T12/B2 type athlete. He raced at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He finished second in the 800 meter T12 race. == References == Category:Spanish middle-distance runners Category:Living people Category:1978 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T12 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2 Category:People from the Region of Murcia
